English: I wonder what Ryuji wants us to see?
Chinese:
龍司希望我們可以見證的事，
究竟是什麼啊？
Korean:
류지가 우리에게 지켜봐주길 바라는 게
대체 뭘까?
German: Ich frage mich, was Ryuji uns zeigen wollte?

English:
No idea. He said he'll be waiting in Ikebukuro,
but where in Ikebukuro? "You'll see when you get
here." Not really enough to go on.
Chinese:
不知道……
……話說「在池袋等你」是指池袋的哪裡啦。
不要用這種「去了就會知道」的方式講話啦。
Korean:
글쎄……
…그보다「이케부쿠로에서 기다린다」니 이케부쿠로 어딘데.
이렇게「가보면 알아」같은 식으로 말하지 말라고
German:
Keine Ahnung. Er sagte, er würde in Ikebukuro
warten, aber wo in Ikebukuro? „Das siehst du dann
schon.“ Nicht gerade hilfreich.

English: Oh, it's this hacker I know.
Chinese: 喔……是認識的駭客打過來的。

English:
Hi, what's up? Long time no see. Huh? Ryuji's
doing what?
Chinese:
喲，怎麼了？　很久不見了啊
……嗯？　你說龍司怎麼了？
Korean:
오우, 무슨 일이야? 오랜만이네.
……응? 류지가 어쨌다고?
German:
Hallo! Lange nicht gesehen. Wie bitte? Ryuji macht
was?

English:
I get it! Well I don't really get it, but I kinda
get it! I'm on my way!
Chinese:
我、我知道了！
不，雖然我不太清楚，總之我知道了！！
會馬上過去那裡的！
Korean:
아, 알았어!
아니 잘 모르겠지만 어쨌든 알았어!!
바로 그쪽으로 간다!
German:
Verstanden! Nun, nicht ganz, aber ich hab kapiert,
worum’s geht! Bin schon unterwegs!

English:
This is bad! I'm not quite sure, but it looks like
Ryuji has gathered some hackers at Hudie's former
site and started some kind of rampage!
Chinese:
糟了……！ 不知道到底是怎麼了，
龍司好像聚集了駭客，在hudie的遺跡
“開始失控了”…！
Korean:
큰일났다……! 잘 모르겠지만 류지가 후디에 부지에
해커를 모아놓고 "폭주하기 시작했다" 라고 그러는데…!
German:
Das ist übel! Ich bin mir nicht sicher, aber
anscheinend hat Ryuji ein paar Hacker an Hudies
altem Territorium versammelt und randaliert dort!

English: I don't know any more than you!
Chinese: 我也不知道到底發生什麼事啊！
Korean:
나도 어떻게 된 건지 정확히는
몰라!
German: Ich weiß auch nicht mehr darüber!

English: We destroyed Arcadiamon! What's going on?!
Chinese:
明明已經把阿卡迪獸消滅了啊……
到底發生了什麼事……！？
Korean:
알카디몬은 소멸했을 텐데…
대체 무슨 일이 일어난 거지……!?
German:
Wir haben das Arkadimon zerstört! Was ist da
los?!

English:
There's no point staying here talking about it!
We've gotta get to Hudie! Wormmon!
Chinese:
光用想的也得不到答案啊──！
趕快去池袋吧，[p]！！　蟲蟲獸！
Korean:
생각해봤자 끝이 없어!
이케부쿠로로 서두르자, [p]!! 추추몬!
German:
Es bringt nichts, hier zu stehen und darüber zu
reden! Wir müssen zu Hudie! Wormmon!
